overview:
Jamie Miller, COO & CFO

Jamie Miller oversees thePlatform’s Accounting, Human Resources, and Legal departments, and leads our growing Professional Services organization. Jamie has an extensive background in professional services consulting, having served as COO/CFO and EVP Business Development at ePartners, Microsoft’s largest business applications consultancy in the United States, with nearly 400 employees. Jamie began his executive career as CFO of an e-commerce startup, and has progressed successfully to roles as COO, President and CEO. Jamie was also a member of the executive team early on at thePlatform, acting as COO/CFO from 2000 to 2003 following thePlatform’s merger with Rocketvox. Jamie’s strong management history and passionate leadership make him a pivotal contributor to thePlatform’s growth and success.
